title: Into the Sunlight
overview: Self-absorbed and rebellious, In Ha constantly knocking heads with his disapproving father and estranged brother Myung Ha, an angry gangster that has nothing but hate for the family he never knew. When the brothers' relationships with In Ha's troubled fiancee and Myung Ha's close friend begin to cross over, they must come to terms with each other, or risk losing both their family and true love.
